body: @yoleorosa Lol, this is the old Fuetakishi’s work we’re talking about here. He used to write a ton of vanilla doujinshi back then and his art style was still developing. He’s been working on the two NTR doujinshi. A one occurring one and a new one for Comiket 95. Fuetakishi today is an NTR and has a better developed art style as you can clearly see here.
all of this is already translated into in english, the chapters and bonus chapters were uploaded separately a long time ago.
First part was a bit gross but ok overall.
Hmm, a nice temporary change from the NTR bullshit he's been on. We'll be back to the bullshit soon, tho.
